name: PharmaCadence Analytical Services
tag_list: bioanalysis, cro, bioanalytics, lc-msms, drug-discovery, analytical-serivce
overview:
PharmaCadence Analytical Services is a bioanalytical contract research organization (CRO) that seeks further understanding of human disease through the facilitation of biotech companies.

PharmaCadence offers targeted quantitative and qualitative analysis of preclincal drugs using state-of-the-art LC-MS/MS techniques combined with over sixty years of experience gained by working in the pharmaceutical industry. PharmaCadence also can use their experience in giving training seminars and performing consultations for companies of all sizes (from small start-ups to pharmaceutical giants).
